title: Battle Cards Series
description:
Format: ePub

DRM stripped in Calibre.

Battle Cards books, turning a regular deck of cards into different games. 


Follow me on twitter: @livhre
Request books on twitter: @livhre
Please seed and rate the torrents I upload. Go to kobobooks.com and choose books that you want uploaded and request them in the comments.
Note: Comics on that site are in some weird ass format that only works on iOS and Android. To get those I have to go through the tired process of screen shots of each page, then create a word file, then convert to epub. Its a pain because even then the images may not show up right on some devices/apps.
